definition: to ascertain/to identify/to verify (sb's identity etc)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: This ore assays high in gold.
sentences.chinese: 這種礦石被驗明含金量高。

sentences.english: The cheque will be cashed upon proof of identity.
sentences.chinese: 這支票驗明取款人身份後即兌現。

sentences.english: The ore assays high in silver.
sentences.chinese: 這種礦石驗明含銀量很高。

sentences.english: Simulating analyses identify that the presented scheme is successful.
sentences.chinese: 通過仿真分析驗明瞭所給控制算法是成功的。

sentences.english: The ore assays high in silver .
sentences.chinese: 這種礦石驗明含銀量很高。
